channel.title: My Tech Notes
channel.description: Recent content on My Tech Notes

item.title: About
item.description: I’m easily intrigued to learn stuff. I started off as Java developer and migrated to SRE. Go has a special place in my heart for being strongly type, easy to compile and deploy all architectures I’ve ever used.

item.title: My Raspberry Pi Setup
item.description: Tired of configuring my RBP I’ve had a raspberry pi for a while and most of the time it rests off in a drawer. From time to time I dust off the SD card to setup the box with dynamic DNS and play with it as my personal server.
